name: Simple Golf (F5 Game Studio)
description:
A Simple, Difficult Game, Golf and With Highscore Time!. It only has 20 levels for now. I mean, because of the fact that it only has 20 levels, I added a Highscore System! To be able to share with your Friends!!!. Who Completes the Game Fastest?...

In this game you only have one chance to shoot! I mean, the Ball never Stops!! The Ball Will Always Continue With The Same Starting Speed.

When you feel that the shot was not good, or you just want to retry the level. Press [R]

NOTE!!!!:

Browser Version Has a Problem!!!. When The Game Starts The Music Will Play But You May Not See The Game! Yes This Happens Zoom Out Of The Page Until You Can See It... When You Can See The Game Press [Esc] And Done!!.

The Screenshots are saved in:  %Appdata% \ SimpleGolf

[Alt]+[R] to Restart Game. [Alt]+[Enter] to Fullscreen. [Alt]+[F4] to Exit. [R] to Restart the Level. [F10] to Save a Screenshot.
